inclusion.criterion: Patient at the Women and Infants Triage/Women's Emergency Department
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have a missed abortion, inevitable abortion, incomplete abortion or other nonviable pregnancy
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Estimated gestational age up to 10 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Undergoing MVA at the Women and Infants Triage/Women's Emergency Department
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to read English or Spanish
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to give informed consent for involvement in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is on anti-depressants for the past 6 months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Allergic to lidocaine, iodine or betadine
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known sensitivity to any component of the lidocaine or placebo gel.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unable to read English or Spanish
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has persistent feelings of sadness and loss of interest in daily activities. She is on anti-depressants for the past 6 months, but the symptoms are still present.
